display_long_description:
**No Mess, All Play**

Tired of awesome ideas but don't want the actual mess? Meet **Home Runs**. We're bringing the fun of building an awesome **marble run**—think pipes, ramps, funnels, and all the cool physics-bending gear—right into your living space, but without the hassle of... well, stuff.

Forget that frantic scramble to clean up before company arrives. With **Home Runs**, you can build the most complex, multi-level track right over your favorite rug. AR lets you snap pieces together easily, test your physics skills, and watch your marbles tumble, roll, and fly in glorious augmented reality.

Here’s the breakdown:

- 🛠️ **True DIY Feel**: Use familiar, household-style objects to construct your tracks. It feels like you found the ultimate building materials in your garage!
- 🧠 **Sandbox & Puzzles**: Want to freestyle? Go for it! Need a challenge? Tackle our physics-based puzzle levels to earn new parts.
- 🔄 **Record and Share**: Show off your best runs! Record your creations and challenge friends to beat your distance.

It’s time to stop sketching and start building. Grab your headset and let's get rolling!
